summary: This is an internal email from July 30, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It states that Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate, with both Suicide Watch and Psych Observation listed as 'None'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, identified as inmate #76318-054, who is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs a new cellmate assignment.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal email indicates inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation status and requires housing with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 30, 2019, just days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It states that Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was being taken off of Psych Observation.
It notes that both Suicide Watch and Psych Observation statuses were listed as 'None' for Epstein at the time.
The email directs that Epstein needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate following the change in his observation status.
